de.galgtonold.jollydayandroid.parser

Class AbstractHolidayParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.galgtonold.jollydayandroid.parser.AbstractHolidayParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HolidayParser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EthiopianOrthodoxHolidayParser, FixedParser, FixedWeekdayBetweenFixedParser, FixedWeekdayInMonthParser, FixedWeekdayRelativeToFixedParser, HinduHolidayParser, IslamicHolidayParser, RelativeToEasterSundayParser, RelativeToFixedParser

    public abstract class AbstractHolidayParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements HolidayParser
    The abstract base class for all HolidayParser implementations.
